articles.title: Sony says merger talks with Zee Entertainment will continue till January 20 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The news comes a day after Zee Entertainment issued a clarification on news reports which highlighted Sony's plans to pull the plug on the merger, calling them "baseless" and "factually incorrect."

articles.title: Hot Stocks: Brokerages view on RIL, ONGC, BPCL, Godrej Consumer and Infosys - The Economic Times
articles.description: CLSA maintained a buy rating on RIL with a target price of Rs 3060. Organic and inorganic triggers are likely to come together and support the up move in 2024.
articles.content: Brokerage firm CLSA maintained a buy rating on RIL, Goldman Sachs downgraded ONGC, BPCL, and IOC. Jefferies has a buy rating on Godrej Consumer and Nuvama upgraded Infosys to buy ahead of Q3 results.… [+3074 chars]

articles.title: Bajaj Auto tops M&M in m-cap to regain 3rd largest auto co tag - The Economic Times
articles.description: The market capitalisation of one of the countrys largest two- and three-wheeler makers surged to Rs 2.09 lakh crore on Tuesday, crossing M&Ms market value of Rs 2.03 lakh crore. Maruti Suzuki is the most valuable automaker, followed by Tata Motors.
